DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : characterize hypertensive patient treat least 1 month Telmisartan ( alone combination drug ) order define beneficiary population ( actually receive treatment ) . Secondary objective : - describe patient ' blood pressure value ( self-monitored ) satisfaction treatment ( ease use , efficacy , safety ) basis patient self-questionnaire , fill 4 week consultation . - compare characteristic beneficiary population initial target population define SPC ( summary product characteristic ) Telmisartan
DOC.brief_title: Study Describing Hypertensive Population Treated With Telmisartan Conditions Use Medical Practitioners Patients
DOC.criteria: Hypertensive patient treat Telmisartan least one month , consult medical practitioner ( whatever reason )
